intent_atoms.description: The system must document macOS and Linux fixture storage quotas, mount expectations, and cache maintenance guidance in Documentation/FixtureCatalog/README.md.
Archive notes under DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/86_PDD_30m_Fixture_Storage_README to preserve historical context.
As a developer, I want to exercise the storage workflow end-to-end on macOS hardware so that I can validate the sparse bundle mount integration.
The CI job scripts must include commands to mount and test the sparse bundle after macOS hardware is available.
